PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Listed nearly 100k BELOW ASSESSED VALUE! Welcome to this bright & spacious 4 bed, 3.5 bath home in an unbeatable, central neighbourhood. Just 6 doors into Elkridge, this property offers effortless curb-appeal & an oversized, lofted, double garage. The foyer welcomes you with cathedral ceilings & an inviting, open-concept living area. The contemporary kitchen boasts two tone cabinets, stone countertops, & an island designed for entertaining. The dining room flows out onto a private patio and fully fenced yard – perfect for kids and pets! Upstairs offers 3 bedrooms, ensuite, & shared bathroom. The basement features TONS of storage, a cozy rec/family room & an additional bedroom & bathroom. Minutes from golf, beach, shopping, world-class wineries, and parks galore; this home offers all the luxuries of Okanagan living at an attainable price point. Storage + square footage + central location + chic interior = EXACTLY what your growing family has been searching for. Come take a look! (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Welcome to 5 Whitley Lane, a charming home conveniently located a very short drive to the 401 and only a few minutes to shopping and schools. Offering 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms this home is nicely tucked away from the road, on a dead end street. Upon entry, you will find a lovely foyer opening to the main living room. The large living room is perfect for sitting back and relaxing yet large enough for entertaining. The eat-in kitchen is open and spacious with loads of storage. Walkout to your back deck from your kitchen into your garden - a perfect place to unwind. The freshly stained deck is open and perfect for all of your patio furniture. An additional family room on the main floor makes this home perfect for families - especially if you need a bit more space to spread out or escape! Conveniently located on the main level - there is a laundry room with a 2 piece bathroom. The second level of the home features 3 bedrooms and a full 4 piece bathroom - perfect for your family! An amazing feature of this home is the attached garage - heated and extra long for storage or a workshop AND includes inside access to the home! The driveway is huge and has space all of your vehicles. If gardening is your passion there are lovely gardens for you to make your own. The basement is dry and great for storing all of your extras. Trenton is located just over an hour from the GTA and has all of the conveniences that you need. Schools, shopping, marinas, Provincial Parks just to name a few. This home is less than 10 minutes from CFB Trenton - great for those posted here! (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: A high end home built in 2016! This 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is finished with impeccable detail and is ready for its second owners. The main floor of this beautiful bilevel features an open concept design with soaring vaulted ceilings, spacious entry, a large living room with a fireplace, and a comfortable dining room with access to the back deck/pergola. Down the hall you will find a nice sized secondary bedroom, a four piece bathroom with granite/tile, and the large master bedroom. Downstairs offers two more bedrooms, the utility/laundry room, another four piece bathroom, and a large rec room. The backyard is well landscaped with stone pavers, fully fenced with back alley access, and has a detached 12x30 workshop with parking for some toys. There is ample parking in the double concrete driveway, and an attached heated garage! (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Welcome to Canterbury Court, Vernon’s finest elegant 55+ independent retirement living residence, where you can feel at home with caring staff and a cozy suite. This 759 sq ft unit is a two-bedroom, one bath with full kitchen and a generous sized living room with lots of natural light, a storage room, and numerous updates. Canterbury offers so many amenities within its walls, from the grand dining room for your meals, country kitchen for a more intimate gathering, rec room, lounge, theatre room, library, craft room, hair salon, fitness room, shared laundry on each floor, and the exterior has a large patio with pond and tranquil waterfalls and a deck with fairy & vegetable gardens. Canterbury has it all, for those looking for a much simpler lifestyle, yet so much to do that you start your social calendar filled with activities. Canterbury offers an attractive investment now for when you are ready to take the next step in your later retirement years in a secure and convenient location. Unit amenities include, in floor heating, air conditioning, Hydro, water, sewer, garbage, cable tv, in suite sprinklers, security safe, 24-hour emergency call in rooms, 24-hour security, church services and more. PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Step into this well crafted 2 storey, attached home, in the family friendly community of Montgomery. Gleaming hardwood floors lead you throughout the main floor, from your formal living room to the open concept kitchen, dining and family room. Kitchen features a large center island with trendy pendant lights, granite countertops, SS appliances and an abundance of storage space through ceiling height cabinets and corner pantry. Family room is flooded with natural sunlight through the large window. A stone surround gas mantle fireplace completes the space. The family room leads to a dedicated rear mudroom with a closet for all your family’s belongings. Upstairs, your primary bedroom offers vaulted ceilings and a beautiful deep green feature wall. A double sided gas fireplace leads to your 5 piece ensuite bathroom with water closet, dual vanity, and soaker tub. The primary bedroom also features a spacious walk-in closet. Two additional good sized bedrooms with large closets, a 4 piece bathroom and a laundry room complete the upper level. Fully finished lower level is family friendly with a large rec room, additional 4th bedroom and 4 piece bathroom. The backyard features a spacious deck, large garden boxes (perfect for the urban gardener), and access to a double detached garage. A sunny south patio is located at the front of the home, to maximize time spent outdoors, along with an easy to manage perennial garden with 3 varieties of peonies. Located within walking distance to Bowmont Park, Montalban off leash dog park, schools and playgrounds and within close proximity to Market Mall, the University of Calgary, Foothills Hospital, and the Alberta Children’s Hospital. You’ll also have quick access to Bow River, city bike pathways, Shouldice Park, and Edworthy Park. Main Street modernization is in progress, creating a trendy gathering of restaurants and shopping. All this within a very quick commute to downtown (15 minute drive, 20-30 mins by bus or bike). (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Welcome home to your Scenic Acres oasis. This stunning home has marvelous curb appeal and a fantastic layout. Walk into the open foyer featuring a formal family room, with vaulted ceilings, arched, full-height windows, pristine maple hardwood, and great lighting leading into the formal dining room. The kitchen is beautifully renovated with granite counters, full-height tile backsplash and a large eating nook leading out to your private serene back deck with custom power awing, gas BBQ and gazebo. The family room boasts a brick-faced gas fireplace and floor-to-ceiling built-ins. Stunning windows overlooking the beautifully landscaped backyard. A den makes a perfect home office. Next to the entry from the oversized double garage is an amazing laundry room that has a laundry sink, built-ins, as well as shelving. Upstairs, the master is a haven with an enormous walk-in closet. The spa-inspired ensuite is luxurious, with stone counters, dual sinks, a glassed-in seated shower, heated flooring and a stand-alone tub. There are three additional bedrooms up, plus a large main 4-piece bath complete with a bright skylight. The walkout basement offers large windows in the great room and a rec room next to the 4th bedroom or hobby room. There is a ton of storage, a separate shop/ furnace room and rough-ins for a potential bathroom in the basement. No expense was spared in the outdoor living space. The private oasis includes many fruit trees and shrubs, a raspberry patch, gardens, perennials and a relaxing water pond and gorgeous fountain. The balcony and patio are surrounded by trees for amazing privacy. This home is move-in ready with recent updates including New carpeting in bedrooms upstairs, New furnace and air conditioner replaced in 2016, New water Heater replaced in 2017, and All Poly B plumbing removed and replaced in 2020. The new roof, facia, and eaves were replaced in 2021 Front windows, along with the basement picture window replaced in 2022. The induction/ Convectio n stove was replaced 2021, New washer in 2021, and so much more. Don't miss your opportunity; book your showing today. (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Serenity and calm, the first words that come to mind when you walk into this home. With 1700 sqft on the main floor and a total of 4 bedrooms and two bathrooms there is ample room for your family. Original wood floors run throughout the main floor and the morning light in the living room is stunning which features a new gas fireplace and a feature ceiling with recessed lighting. The original Eldred Palmer kitchen cabinetry and woodwork is a testament to fine craftsmanship and there is an adjacent dining room and a pantry. The den just off the main entry also has access to the double attached garage. There are two large bedrooms and a 4 piece bathroom on the main floor and two more bedrooms and a 3 piece bathroom downstairs. The family room is perfect for large gatherings and the wood stove in the adjacent room makes for a cozy reading room. A second set of stairs leads up to the back yard from the basement, which also has a laundry/utility/storage room. The apple tree and plum tree in the back yard provide shade to the deck area, a great spot to relax. There are new trees in the front yard and several updates to the property that can be found in the supplements. This gracious home backs on to Centennial Park so there are no homes behind you. Book a showing and see if this is where you will put your feet up. (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Welcome to your dream acreage in the highly sought-after Gleneden community! This stunning, efficient, and newer-built rancher with a walkout basement is situated on a serene 5-acre lot and offers complete privacy and tranquility. With 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom on the main level, and 2 bedrooms plus a master bedroom with an ensuite downstairs, this home is perfect for everyone. The large partially finished greenhouse outside provides the perfect space to grow your own food or raise animals. You'll love the high efficiency furnace which is rated at an impressive 98%, as well as triple glaze tilt and turn windows. This is a Step Code 4 efficiency home with R-24 insulation in the walls, and R-50 in the attic. With all these features, you can be sure that your heating bills will be minimal. The kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring quartz and larch fir counters, gas stove, and custom cabinetry. Well thought out solid core doors, birch-lined window frames, and a no-trim design add to the overall elegant feel of the home. Outside, there's a 20x20 carport and a 25'x48' cold frame greenhouse that's 95% completed. There are two hose bibs, a generator connection for backup power, and fully fenced yard. The Malarkey storm shingles, board and baton siding, and vinyl flooring add to the home's overall durability and style. The property features a 12GPM well and a new 10GPM well pump installed in 2023. RV site with septic and 50amp power. Not in ALR. Second Residence permitted! (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: SEE VIRTUAL TOUR ABOVE the moment you step through the door, this fully renovated, turn-key residence will captivate you! Every aspect of this home has been meticulously renovated to perfection. The upgrades are endless & truly unparalleled. The open-concept layout is both welcoming & visually stunning. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring; top-of-the-line KitchenAid s/s appliances, Counter-depth ‘fresh-food’ fridge with water, double oven with 5 burner gas cooktop with griddle & electric convection oven. Custom-built Zen cabinetry with slow close mechanisms, undercounter lighting, full length pantry & pull-out drawers. Large storage pantry, glass & stone backsplash & luxurious ‘leather’ finish granite countertops. Oversized silgranit low divide sink, American Standard Professional Pull-Down Faucet, ISE Evolution XL Garburator, Sink Top Switch & Soap Dispenser. The attention to detail continues in the living room with the vaulted ceiling, large windows, luxury vinyl flooring, custom nose caps on stairs & designer lighting creating ambiance throughout. The home has custom Hunter Douglas bottom-up top-down blinds and dark-out blinds in the primary. The master bath is a true spa-retreat, with a freestanding soaker tub & hand-held, the Carrera marble shower has a rain head, handheld for easy cleaning, glass surround & sliding glass door. The double undermount sink, marble vanity has ample drawer space, AmStd faucets, matching mirrors & medicine cabinet. The 1 pce contemporary AmStd toilet, finishes the final look. No expense has been spared in transforming this home from top to bottom – pluming, including the ‘poly b’ has been replaced & the electrical systems, have all been upgraded with additional panel. It has a new high efficiency furnace, 50 gallon gas water tank, humidifier, & low db noise air conditioner, ensuring peace of mind & hassle-free living for years to come. Doors, casing, baseboards, door hardware, is all high end, including front door and garage door keyless entry. It is wired with high speed Telus fibre-optic internet. Say goodbye to maintenance concerns and hello to worry-free condo living! The lower walkout level is equally detailed. From the lavish spill & stain resistant carpet & pad that was recently installed to the Gas fireplace with stone surround, exquisite built ins/bar/floating shelves – it is the perfect place to relax or entertain. A bedroom & Den/Spare/Workout room to the storage/craft/sewing area, top-of-the-line LG w/dryer, high end bathroom plus large windows, it feels nothing like a basement. The exterior of this home is a breathtaking extension of the home. Complete with exposed aggregate patio, large trees, gas bbq line & vinyl fence, you have amazing privacy - a tranquil setting with convenient access to all amenities. Shopping, dining, entertainment, & reputable schools just a block away. Homes of this caliber rarely come on the market, & when they do…. They certainly don't last long. Book your showing now! (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Most cabin bungalows don't have pavement right to their driveway. Well this one does. North of Teepee Creek Alberta just a few minutes lies 11 acres of rural lifestyle with a balance of bush and open space, fenced for horses too! The 880 square foot cabin rests on an ICF crawl space which houses the cistern for your water needs. There's a massive dugout if you'd like to access even more water. Propane heats the home and advised there's a gas line at the highway. Imagine the gentle sound of rain on the red tin roof. Two bedrooms, a bathroom, galley style kitchen plus a spacious living, dining area make up this many-windows well lit home. The long driveway has the cabin well set back so highway sounds are muffled. A barbecue pit area nestled in the bush out back for entertaining people folk while the horses enjoy their grazing area. CR-5 zoning opens up many options for business-at-home ideas so bring your creativity to Teepee Creek and get settled. There's a school and groceries 6km nearby at Teepee (as well as their famous rodeo) or head south about 20km to Bezanson for fuel, or west about 30km to Sexsmith for more schools, or about a half hour 50km to Grande Prairie. (id:52939)

The sprawling main level is designed for one level living with the primary bedroom on the east wing and the home gym on left wing and the kitchen, living and dining area open to the pool courtyard. The upper level extends your living space with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on each wing with a rec room and rooftop patio in the middle. The triple car garage includes an oversized boat garage perfect for the toys. Price includes 4200 sq.ft finished living space, inground pool with landscaping and a high end finishing allowance. There is an option to add a double garage with 960 sq.ft carriage house (at an additional cost). Floorplans of this new build can be customized to suit any needs. Choose your finishings with award-winning kitchen designers, high-end fixtures and luxury appliance package. Your new home would be built and ready for occupancy in, in 8-12 months. Lenercic Brothers are well known and respected in the building industry for their attention to detail and quality craftsmanship. (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Have you ever dreamed of living in a house that looked like it came out of story book? If so this home is for you! Nestled at the end of a almost hidden circular driveway this beautiful home with a circular turret really does have the feel like it popped out of a story book. Walk through the front door and you are greeted with beautiful ceramic floored foyer. Straight ahead is a large kitchen which features granite counter tops and vinyl flooring. The main floor living room with hardwood flooring is inviting with its wood fireplace. The dining room features hardwood flooring as well and large windows. The 3-seasoned sunroom is the perfect place to have your morning coffee while watching the sun rise or the perfect place to end your day looking out at the serene backyard watching the birds and squirrels as they play. This home has huge primary bedroom with a 5-piece ensuite. NOTE: Potential 2 lower level bedrooms can easily be added. Main floor laundry means no carrying up and down the stairs! Walking to the barn you get a feeling of excitement and happiness. This barn is not “just a barn”. As you walk in the door, the huge workshop with a garage door is the perfect place to do your projects. The tack room is insulated. In the barn you will find 7 beautifully painted horse stalls. As you exit the barn you will find another barn which is currently used to store hay. This 22.51 acre farm has 12 paddocks and several run-in sheds. Off to the side of the barn is an enclosure that was made for chickens, ducks, rabbits or other small animals. It was constructed with galvanized welded mesh wire. Out past the buildings is the hay field. This farm really has to be seen to appreciate all it offers! Love privacy? There are no neighbours across the road and the woodlands on either side and back of the farm give privacy from the neighbouring properties. Don’t miss out on what might be your dream farm. (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Year-round getaway on Haliburton Lake! Welcome to The Essex, an updated 3 bedroom + loft, 2 bath lakefront getaway. Located in the heart of Haliburton County with 100' of clean frontage on the lake, sun all day, amazing boating, swimming & more. The spacious foyer guides you into the open-concept kitchen, dining & living area with vaulted ceilings. Large windows & 3 walkouts from the living area bring you to the lakefront deck where you can enjoy meals, get some sun, pop into the lakeside hot tub & take in the beautiful big-lake views. The kitchen/dining area focus on function & fun with an island, bar, walk-out to the front deck & ample storage space. A staircase from the principal rooms brings you into the private second-floor primary suite with a large bedroom, a Juliet balcony, 4-PC ensuite bath & ample closet space. PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Welcome to your dream home! This exquisite sprawling walk-out bungalow, nestled on a stunning two-acre lot backing onto a seasonal pond, offers a serene retreat with its almost 4800 square feet of developed living space. Prepare to be amazed as you step inside, where the main floor has been thoughtfully and tastefully renovated to perfection.As you enter through the front door, you'll be greeted by the grandeur of vaulted ceilings in the spacious living room. The natural light streaming through the large windows creates an inviting and warm ambiance, making this space perfect for entertaining guests or simply relaxing with your loved ones.The heart of the home lies in the new, modern kitchen that showcases top-of-the-line appliances including a double built-in wall oven, sleek flooring, and exquisite finishes. Whether you're a seasoned chef or an aspiring home cook, this kitchen will inspire your culinary creativity and become the central gathering place for family and friends.The basement of this remarkable home is a haven for recreation and family enjoyment. Offering a spacious layout, it presents an expansive area that can be tailored to meet your unique needs. Whether you envision a home theater, a game room, or a place for family gatherings, this versatile space has it all. Additionally, the basement features two well-appointed bedrooms and a large office which could easily work as a 6th bedroom, providing comfortable accommodations for guests or growing family members. For wine enthusiasts or those who appreciate a well-stocked cellar, a dedicated cold/wine room awaits, allowing you to store and display your collection in style. With the walkout basement offering such exceptional versatility and amenities, this home truly has something for everyone.Step outside and discover the true beauty of this property. At the front entrance, you'll find a large covered patio, ideal for enjoying your morning coffee or soaking in the picturesque views of the surrounding landscape. The back of the home boasts two expansive decks, one of which is connected to the primary bedroom, providing a private sanctuary where you can unwind and bask in the tranquility of your surroundings.You’ll also appreciate the stamped concrete patio outside the walk-out basement, perfect for hosting summer barbecues or lounging in the sunshine. As the evening sets in, gather around the stunning stamped concrete sunken firepit, where stories will be shared, marshmallows roasted, and memories created.This home has undergone recent upgrades, including the replacement of the septic tank, newer roof, hot water heaters, shop heater, . Additionally, the property features an oversized triple attached garage, offering ample space for your vehicles and additional storage. For those in need of even more storage or a workspace, a double detached garage with an attached large shop awaits. Call now for your private showing. (id:52939)

PropertyDetails.PublicRemarks: Welcome to your new home in one of Calgary’s most lively and conveniently located neighborhoods. This 3 bed, 2.5 bath home opens to a beautifully renovated main floor, featuring hardwood floors, gas fireplace and a newer kitchen with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and gas stove.Upstairs sits the generous master bedroom with walk-in closet, along with two other good-sized bedrooms. One room is currently being used as an office, making this a perfect work-from-home space. Also on this floor is the first of two full bathrooms. The home is open, bright and airy, with plenty of natural light. Lower level is completely finished and includes another full bathroom along with high efficiency, front loading washer and dryer in the laundry room. Furnace and hot water tank have been well-cared for and serviced regularly. Home is also equipped with a central vac system. Outside, the fully fenced and secure backyard is a pet parent’s delight, offering plenty of space for your doggo to run around and sniff to his heart’s content. There’s also a handy dog run for those who wish to keep their furry friends off the lawn. Don’t mind the straw! The current owners are re-seeding with clover, fescue, and wildflower blends which are more pet resistant and easier to maintain. You’ll love the expansive deck with plenty of room to BBQ or lounge on your favourite patio chairs. There’s also a well insulated two car garage. McKenzie Towne sits at the intersection of Stoney and Deerfoot, making it easily accessible and a quick 15 minute drive to downtown. All amenities are closeby, many within walking distance. There are plenty of parks and greenspaces in the area, including a popular splash park just down the road. This home is move-in ready and has been well-loved by its current owners.. (id:52939)

High vaulted ceilings, an abundance of windows and the beautiful wood accents throughout the home are just a few of the things that make this home so spectacular. Outside you will find mature gardens including over 15 raised garden beds, a terraced herb garden, a fenced in-ground garden space with a high-producing apple tree and lots of raspberries! Tons of RV parking with 3 spots, ready for family and friends or possible income helper, which are already set up with water and power. Septic lines from RV spots have been run and just need the tank. There are also multiple outbuildings on the land including: A newly finished 16x10 workshop with heat and power.
